properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 20 at 3:18PM EST until February 22 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, 1 to 2 feet of
inundation above ground level expected in low- lying areas near
shorelines and tidal waterways. For the High Surf Advisory,
large breaking waves of 7 to 10 feet expected in the surf zone.

* WHERE...For High Surf Advisory north of Cape Hatteras. For
Coastal Flood Advisory sound side of Hatteras Island mainly
south of Buxton.

* WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from 7 PM this evening
to 7 PM EST Friday. For the High Surf Advisory, from 10 PM
this evening to 1 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only
isolated road closures expected. Dangerous swimming and
surfing conditions and localized beach erosion.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to
dangerous surf conditions.

NWSheadline: COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EST SATURDAY
